    Getting started

    getting-started.Rmd
    library(procedural)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)

    The ICD-10-PCS, or International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Procedure Coding System, is a procedure classification system developed by 3M Health Information Systems and adopted under HIPAA for classifying procedures performed in hospital inpatient health care settings.


    Coding Conventions

    PCS codes are composed of seven alphanumeric characters. Each character contains up to 34 possible values. The seven characters that make up a complete code have specific meanings that vary for each of the 17 sections of the manual.

    Each value represents a specific option for the general character definition. 10 digits (0-9) and 24 letters (A-H, J-N, and P-Z) may be used in each character.

    The letters O and I are not used so as to avoid confusion with the digits 0 and 1.

    Axes

    Each character is an axis of classification that specifies information about the procedure performed.

    Within a defined code range, a character specifies the same type of information in that axis of classification.

    For example, The fifth axis of classification specifies the Approach in sections 0 through 4 and 7 through 9 of the system.

    axis name
    1 Section
    2 Body System
    3 Root Operation
    4 Body Part
    5 Approach
    6 Device
    7 Qualifier
    AXIS 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
    Name Section Body System Root Operation Body Part Approach Device Qualifier

    Sections

    Systems 

    systems()
    #> # A tibble: 114 Ã— 4
#>     axis name        code  label                                    
#>    <int> <chr>       <chr> <chr>                                    
#>  1     2 Body System 00    Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
#>  2     2 Body System 01    Peripheral Nervous System                
#>  3     2 Body System 02    Heart and Great Vessels                  
#>  4     2 Body System 03    Upper Arteries                           
#>  5     2 Body System 04    Lower Arteries                           
#>  6     2 Body System 05    Upper Veins                              
#>  7     2 Body System 06    Lower Veins                              
#>  8     2 Body System 07    Lymphatic and Hemic Systems              
#>  9     2 Body System 08    Eye                                      
#> 10     2 Body System 09    Ear, Nose, Sinus                         
#> # â„¹ 104 more rows
    joined <- systems() |> 
  select(sys.axis = name,
         sys.code = code, 
         sys.label = label) |>
  rowwise() |> 
  mutate(code = splitter(sys.code)[1]) |> 
  ungroup() |>
  left_join(sections(), by = join_by(code)) |> 
  select(axis = name, 
         code, 
         label, 
         sys.axis, 
         sys.code, 
         sys.label)
    #> Error in `mutate()`:
#> â„¹ In argument: `code = splitter(sys.code)[1]`.
#> â„¹ In row 1.
#> Caused by error in `splitter()`:
#> ! could not find function "splitter"
    joined
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'joined' not found
    joined |>
  select(section = label, 
         code = sys.code, 
         system = sys.label) |> 
  gt(groupname_col = "section", 
     rowname_col = "system") |>
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> 
  cols_align(align = "center", columns = code) |>
  cols_label(code = "") |> 
  tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", 
                                   alpha = 0.5), 
                         cell_text(weight = "bold")), 
            locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> 
  opt_all_caps(locations = c("row_group")) |> 
  opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |>
  tab_header(title = html("<b>ICD-10-PCS</b> 2024")) |> 
  tab_options(
    heading.title.font.size = px(22),
    table.font.size = px(14),
    column_labels.border.bottom.width = px(0),
    column_labels.border.top.width = px(0),
    row_group.font.size = px(16),
  )
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'joined' not found

    Tables 

    prp <- prep("001")
    #> Error in prep("001"): could not find function "prep"
    prp
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'prp' not found
    prp$section <- sections(prp$section)[c('code', 'label')]
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'prp' not found
    prp$system <- systems(prp$system)[c('code', 'label')]
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'prp' not found
    prp$table <- tables(prp$table)[c('table', 'description', 'codes')]
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'prp' not found
    prp
    #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'prp' not found

    Definitions 

    definitions() |> 
  summarise(n = n(), 
            .by = c(code, section, axis, axis_name))
    #> # A tibble: 29 Ã— 5

    Medical and Surgical 

    pcs("0016070") |> 
  gt(rowname_col = "axis") |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Rubik")) |> 
  cols_align(align = "center", columns = c(axis, code)) |>
  tab_style(style = list(cell_fill(color = "lightgray", 
                                   alpha = 0.5), 
                         cell_text(weight = "bold")), 
            locations = cells_body(columns = code)) |> 
  opt_all_caps() |> 
  opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |>
  tab_header(title = html("<b>ICD-10-PCS</b> 2024<hr>"),
             subtitle = html("<small>SECTION:</small> <b>0</b> Medical and Surgical<br>
                              <small>SYSTEM:</small> <b>0</b> Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves<br>
                              <small>OPERATION:</small> <b>1</b> Bypass<br><br>"))

    SYSTEM: 0 Central Nervous System and Cranial Nerves
    OPERATION: 1 Bypass
